title: SMALLVILLE Season 6 Disc 3 (DVD5)
description:
Smallville tells the tale of a teenage Clark Kent in the days before he was Superman. It is the town where he came from where very strange things started happening with his arrival in a spaceship in the midst of a meteor storm of green rocks. Clark must deal with a variety of individuals given powers by the green rocks, keep his powers a secret, cope with his friendship with a young Lex Luthor, and balance the two girls in his life, Chloe and Lana. The show also shows us how Lex Luthor develops from a friend of Clark\&#039;s and kinda-okay guy to (presumably) the villain who will plague Superman in his later years.

____________________________________________________________________________

Cast:

Tom Welling, Kristin Kreuk, Michael Rosenbaum, Annette O\&#039;Toole, John Glover
